many unidentified representatives (please visit [[Congress of Worlds (Earth-616)#Congress of Worlds|this section for the full list of representatives]]) | Identity = Public | Affiliation = | Allies = [[League of Realms (Earth-616)|League of Realms]] | Enemies = | Origin = Assembly of representative from the [[Ten Realms]] | Reality = Earth-616 | Status = Active | BaseOfOperations = [[Asgardia]] | PlaceOfFormation = | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = Matt Fraction; Pepe Larraz | First = Mighty Thor Vol 2 9 | History = ===Origin and mission=== [[File:Congress_of_Worlds_(Earth-616)_from_Mighty Thor Vol 2_9.jpg|left|thumb|266px|Races of the Nine Worlds]] The Congress of Worlds was a congregation of representatives of Nine Realms with the purpose to discuss and resolve issues of interest to all of the [[Nine Worlds]].{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 2 10}} The Congress is also tasked with the approval of royal appointments,{{r|Thor Vol 4 5}} such as a King's{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #17}} or a Royal Inquisitor's nomination.{{r|Thor Vol 4 5}} ===Creation=== The first reunion was marked by the aggression from the [[Frost Giants]] of [[Jotunheim|Jotenheim]], denouncing Asgardian dominion over a false republic, quickly killed by the All-Mother.{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 2 9}} Volstagg was eventually elected senator for Asgardia.{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #13}} After [[Heven (Tenth Realm)|Heven]] was reintegrated among the Ten Realms, they were granted representative in the Congress of Worlds,{{r|Loki: Agent of Asgard #14}} while the [[Jotuns]] later departed it, leaving an empty seat.{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 1}} ===League of Realms / [[Accursed (Story Arc)|Svartalfheim Civil War]]=== ... ===[[War of the Realms]]=== ... Visiting a Light Elf refugees camp in the [[Skornheim Mountains]] of Nidavellir along with Senator Volstagg and [[Rosalind Solomon (Earth-616)|Senator Solomon]] of Midgard, he was killed by an attack from Muspelheim along with the refugees.{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 20}} ==Congress of Worlds== The Congress was initially composed of many people from the Nine Realms. Were also present people from many species and groups presents on those Realms.{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 2 9}}{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 2 10}}{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #14}} The Congress assembly was later seen composed of only representatives (usually two) of the Ten Realms.{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 1}} Please find the list of known successive senatresses and senators, representatives and emissaries, with in bold the current ones (the names are presented in chronological order of appearances for each party and their various groups of representatives). * Neutral party ** [[Gaea (Earth-616)|Gaea]]{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 2 10}} * [[Light Elves]] of '''[[Alfheim]]''' ** '''Unidentified senatress''';{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 1}} formerly unnamed Light Elf representative,{{r|Loki: Agent of Asgard #14}} [[Ayelah (Earth-616)|Ayelah]],{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 2 10}} [[Ivory Honeyshot (Earth-616)|Sir Honeyshot]],{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #14}} [[Milkmane (Earth-616)|Milkmane]]{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 1}}{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 20}} * '''[[Asgardia]]'''/[[Asgard]] ** '''[[Volstagg (Earth-616)|Volstagg]]''';{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #13}} formerly [[Idunn (Earth-616)|Idunn]]{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 2 10}} * '''[[Heven (Tenth Realm)|Heven]]''' ** '''Two unidentified [[Angels (Tenth Realm)|Angels]] senatresses''';{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 1}} formerly unidentified Angel representative{{r|Loki: Agent of Asgard #14}} * Jotuns ('''[[Jotunheim]]'''/Jotenheim) ** '''unidentified [[Frost Giant]] senator''';{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 16}} formerly unidentified Frost Giant representative,{{r|Loki: Agent of Asgard #14}} five unidentified Frost Giant assassins{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 2 9}} ** [[Storm Giant]](s){{r|Thor: God of Thunder #14}} ** [[Mountain Giants]] *** Formerly [[Oggmunder Dragglevadd Vinnsuvius XVII (Earth-616)|Oggmunder Dragglevadd Vinnsuvius XVII/"Oggy"]]{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #14}} ** Formerly "[[I of the Storms (Earth-616)|I of the Storms...
